snippet.title: Paratrooper (MS-DOS) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is a very old game I used to play two decades ago on my 80386 :)
You have to destroy helicopters (10 points), jets (10), men (5), bombs (30). Every bullet costs one point.
Thanks to DosBox, here it is again in all its 4-colours CGA glory :)

Note that the menu text is broken because I am an idiot and I changed it with a hex editor in 1998 when I was 14, I've lost the original version since then. Sorry about that -.-
